nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.access
Interface AccessServiceLocal

All Superinterfaces:
AccessService, Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccessServiceImpl
public interface AccessServiceLocal
extends AccessService

Local interface. It must be used only from other services.

checkPassword

User checkPassword(java.lang.String member,
                   java.lang.String username,
                   java.lang.String password,
                   java.lang.String remoteAddress)
                   throws UserNotFoundException,
                          InvalidCredentialsException,
                          BlockedCredentialsException
Checks the password for the given user

Throws:
UserNotFoundException - Invalid username
InvalidCredentialsException - Invalid password
BlockedCredentialsException - The user is blocked by exceding wrong login attempts
